programme.title: The Drastic Social Change in a Once Genteel Game
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke muses on Wimbledon's ability to reconcile historic tradition and modernity.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke examines why how tennis at Wimbledon and across the globe reconciles traditional values with the modern world.
